// analysis/tokenfilters/keyword-marker-tokenfilter.asciidoc:163

[source, python]
----
resp = client.indices.analyze(
    tokenizer="whitespace",
    filter=[
        {
            "type": "keyword_marker",
            "keywords": [
                "jumping"
            ]
        },
        "stemmer"
    ],
    text="fox running and jumping",
    explain=True,
    attributes="keyword",
)
print(resp)
----
